hiruge abhimanawath 21 wana sanwathsarika samaruma wenuwen methek teliwishanaye labadun dawanthama mudal thyagaya wana rupiyal laksha 210 k obata thilina kerena hiruta 21 yi dawas 21 n dasa lakshapathiyan 21 yi pasugiya (10) wana dinaye arambauna.memangin dinapatha dasa lakshapathiyeku bihi karannata hiru sudanam.ee anuwa eeye dasa lakshapathiya bawata pathwune siyambaalanduwa pradeshaye padinchi dabliw.ee.anura sampath.sanduda sita sikurada dakwa rathri 7.30 sita 9.55 dakwa hiru teli perahara narambaimen hiru samanga bandunu obata dasa lakshapathiyeku wimata awasthawa himi wanawa.

aya kagalla predshaye beruddha parisarayaka hadi wadi thibuni......ma aya sith gaththada....ma katholikayeku wu bawin mata prashanayak wiya....kese namuth aya mata mahath se aadaraya karannata patan ganimath mamada boho se aadaraya karannata patan ganima apa wiwahaya dakwa dura digata yana ladi....esema mama ayata wishala lesa anukampa sahagatha lesa balannata hura puraduwa sitiyemi...wisheshayen ayage ahinsaka kama ma sithgath ekama sudusu kama washayen ma hadinwuwada ehi kisidu waradak natha...esema dehiwala kanyaramayaka nawathi sitimin rajakariyata paminima pilibadawa ma etharam sahimakata path nowuyemi.....eheth ma ee wana wita yapanaya predhaye kriyanwitha rajakarinhi niyalemin siti wakawanuwak wiya....ayiyada wiwa wimen anathurawa wenath predshayakata gos sitina ladi.....nangith hediyak wima sadaha puhunuwim pinisa hedi widuhala asalinma nawathan gena sitannata thiranaya kara thibuni ....amma pamanak gedara siti kala wakawanuwak wiya......
